title: Sardinia Trip
description:
This is a Sport climbing trip however there is trad climbing on the island!
We will be based around Cala Gonone where there is 100+ crags within an hour drive.
This trip is open to all climbers. If you are interested in attending please join the group, if you have any questions please let me know.
Please note: The European trip is organised slightly different - participants need to organise the flight, accommodation and car rents between themselves.
